interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Carry Me Home " from Sana Sakakibara

progression.synopsis: Sensei calls Sara and arranges to meet in town â€” outside the "headquarters for some unfamiliar cell phone company", since Sensei doesn't know many places. She appreciates his flirting, strange as it is, saying that it makes her feel young again. After walking around the city for a while, Sensei and Sara talk about Sensei's choice about what sort of relationship he wanted with her. Sara then asks for ideas to improve business at her bar, but Sensei doesn't have anything to offer beyond his own continued patronage. Sara tells Sensei that she enjoys spending time with him, and asks if they can meet like this again.
trivia: Based on your relationship with Sara till this point, the dialog may vary.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
